page.title: 14A day in my life
page.content: The Lollipop Lady sees me across the road & I play in the playground until the bell goes, then I line up & go into class. We only go to school from Monday to Friday. Sometimes we have holidays & we don't go to school at all. School is for learning how to read & how to write. All children go to school until 16 years & some stay longer. Our dads & mums have to pay taxes so the school can be opened & run. I like going to Guides too. We have to wear a uniform. I like animals & the countryside as well. I like going for walks outside in the country. I have a dog as a pet. (J. Storey)
